Package com.dotmarketing.osgi

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractViewToolActivator Deprecated
    Class initially used to register ViewTool objects from and OSGI plugin, now you should use the GenericBundleActivator class instead of this class to register those ViewTool objects using the method GenericBundleActivator.registerViewToolService(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext, org.apache.velocity.tools.view.ToolInfo).
    CombinedLoader
    Created by Jonathan Gamba Date: 7/27/12
    GenericBundleActivator
    Created by Jonathan Gamba Date: 7/23/12
    HostActivator  
    OSGIClassTransformer
    Created by Jonathan Gamba Date: 2/1/13
    OSGIProxyServlet
    Created by Jonathan Gamba Date: 9/18/12
    UrlOsgiClassLoader
    Created by Jonathan Gamba Date: 1/31/13
